directions: Combine plums and raspberries in large bowl. Combine wine, 1 1/2 cups water and sugar in large saucepan. Scrape in seeds from vanilla bean; add bean. Stir over medium heat until sugar dissolves. Increase heat and boil until reduced to 2 2/3 cups, about 20 minutes. Pour hot wine mixture over plum mixture. Cool. Cover and chill overnight.
Spoon fruit mixture into dessert glasses or bowls. Top with cream.
ingredients: 2 pounds red-skinned plums, halved, pitted, each cut into 6 wedges
1 750-ml bottle Beaujolais or dry red wine
title: Plum, Raspberry and Red Wine Compote
